metadata.Title: CVE-2021-28834 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: Kramdown before 2.3.1 does not restrict Rouge formatters to theRouge::Formatters namespace, and thus arbitrary classes can beinstantiated.

criterions.comment: ruby-kramdown: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
ruby-kramdown-rfc2629: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
